title: Mother Hydra
html:
Mother Hydra

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
H Mother Hydra (No tile)
Difficulty 52
Attacks Claw 8d12, Claw 8d10, Bite 6d8
H Mother Hydra (No tile)
Difficulty 52
Attacks

Claw 8d12, Claw 8d10, Bite 6d8

Base level 102
Base experience 2828
Speed 18
Base AC -12
Base MR 90
Alignment -10 (chaotic)
Frequency (by normal means) 0 (Not randomly generated)
Genocidable No
Weight 5000
Nutritional value 500
Size Gigantic
Resistances cold, poison
Resistances conveyed poison

Mother Hydra:

  • can swim.
  • can survive underwater.
  • has a head, a couple of arms, and a torso.
  • has a thick hide.
  • is poisonous to eat.
  • is omnivorous.
  • is not a valid polymorphable form.
  • is female.
  • is normally generated hostile.
  • can follow you to other levels.
  • is strong.
  • can throw boulders.
  • likes gold.
  • likes gems.
  • can pick up weapons and food.
  • has infravision.
  • may turn against you when tame.
  • cannot be tamed.
Reference SLASH'EM_0.0.7E7F2/monst.c#line2662

Mother Hydra is a unique monster from the Cthulhu Mythos who appears in the Lethe patch, Hack'EM and SlashTHEM, and is a deferred feature in SLASH'EM.

SLASH'EM

Despite her status as a deferred feature, Mother Hydra is fully implemented in SLASH'EM, and can in fact be summoned in wizard mode. One could even (fleetingly) see her in a normal game by casting stone to flesh on a wished-for statue of her, producing a doppelganger that would briefly mimic her shape. In this regard, she is similar to Cthulhu.

Compared to Cthulhu, Mother Hydra is in some ways more dangerous: her attacks will cut right through even the thickest of armor, dealing 100+ damage per turn to a character in a full ascension kit. On the other hand, she lacks Cthulhu's spellcasting and resurrection abilities, and in fact has no resistances other than cold or poison. A cockatrice corpse or egg will make short work of her.

Retrieved from "https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Mother_Hydra&oldid=176167"

Mother Hydra is a unique monster from the [[Cthulhu Mythos]] who appears in the [[Lethe patch]], [[Hack'EM]] and [[SlashTHEM]], and is a [[deferred feature]] in [[SLASH'EM]].

==SLASH'EM==

Despite her status as a deferred feature, Mother Hydra is fully implemented in SLASH'EM, and can in fact be summoned in [[wizard mode]].  One could even (fleetingly) see her in a normal game by casting [[stone to flesh]] on a wished-for statue of her, producing a [[doppelganger]] that would briefly mimic her shape.  In this regard, she is similar to [[Cthulhu]].

Compared to Cthulhu, Mother Hydra is in some ways more dangerous: her attacks will cut right through even the thickest of armor, dealing 100+ damage per turn to a character in a full [[ascension kit]].  On the other hand, she lacks Cthulhu's spellcasting and resurrection abilities, and in fact has no resistances other than cold or poison.  A [[cockatrice]] corpse or egg will make short work of her.
